ruling: - [[Dark Armed Dragon]] can still be Special Summoned while there are non-DARK monsters in your Graveyard.
- [[Dark Armed Dragon]]'s effect that destroys 1 card is an Ignition Effect. Removing 1 DARK monster from play is a cost.
- [[Dark Armed Dragon]] cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard, even if it was properly Summoned beforehand.
